Package game_app

Class PauseScene

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
game_app.PauseScene
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class PauseScene
extends javafx.scene.Parent
EXTENSION: Create a new class for pause scene and buttons
